climbs.name: Dod Route
climbs.fa: FA 1966 Eugene Dod, Dave Jensen, Bill Pratt 1966 / FFA 1970's Jeff Thomas & Tom Blust

content.description: Expect loose rock, old pitons/homemade bolts, and some old webbing too. Anchors have been updated with newer bolts but there are still a few relics on the wall. Bring some webbing and rap rings in case you want to swap out older gear.The hike down is not a walk in the park so don't expect to find it easily.Pitch 1: 5.10a bolts and smaller gearPitch 2: 5.10c gear to 4"Pitch 3: 5.11a boltsPitch 4: 5.7 bolted scramble (can be linked with pitch 3)Two 60m ropes will get you down in two rappels (from summit to top of pitch 2 then to the ground)Check out Greg Orton's "Rock Climbing Western Oregon Vol 1: The Willamette" for more detailed info.
Rhyodacitic pinnacles at the upper end of Keith Creek includes Turkey Point (5.8 R to 5.11a R), The Beast (5.11a R/X), Turkey Monster (5.8 A4 to 5.11a).
